m_szDocSumamry: GM Will Stick With Chevy Bolt Name April 28th, 2015 by Christopher DeMorro   Originally published on Gas2 . After GM pulled back the curtain on the Chevy Bolt, its 200-mile electric car concept, one of the first questions a suit asked me was “What do you think of the name?” I shrugged if I’m being honest. It’s better than the meaningless alpha-numeric nomenclature plaguing many luxury car brands, but it doesn’t have the same panache that “Mustang,” “Corvette,” or even “Volt” have.
